summary: A rogue soldier turned outlaw is thrust into a relentless fight with a corrupt sheriff, his obedient deputies, and a dangerous drug cartel in order to protect his sister and her young daughter.

Fernandez|Melita Camilo|Natalya|Holland Diaz|Dennis Ruel|Daniel Graham|Cristina Segovia
keywords: murder of a police officer|shooting a police officer|woman with a gun|barricading a door|kidnapping of daughter
title: Justicia letal
